description:
Learn how to equalize properly. The equalizer is a very powerful tool, but if misused, it can make everything sound worse. With this course you can learn how to use equalizers in the right way and improve the quality of your audio material.

Learn the most important concepts for a good equalization:

  • Types of equalizers, characteristics and applications.
  • Their controls and functions.
  • How the "magic frequencies" of different instruments work.
  • Common EQ tricks for vocals, guitars, drums, bass, etc.
  • Professional procedures to equalize in a fast and effective way.

You can learn how to take the best out of an equalizer!

You will understand in a practical way how to use an equalizer and get better results for your audio productions, songs, podcasts, courses, etc. The techniques you will learn in this course work in the studio as well as in live sound situations, either with hardware or software EQ's, and for editing, mixing or mastering tasks!

Learn the basics of filters, graphic equalizers, parametric, etc. This course is a great introductory option for DJ's, music producers, musicians, podcasters, audio enthusiasts, etc.

Course Overview

First we will deal with the concept of frequency and how it is perceived. We will understand the frequency ranges and their importance in sound. Then we will tackle the use and application of audio filters to minimize unwanted frequencies or to create special effects. After that we will work with equalizers, we will show the different kinds of EQ's and their applications. You'll see demonstrations of equalization procedures for different instruments and you'll be able to practice with the included material. Finally, we are going to talk about Audacity, the free audio editor, and how you can use it to equalize your material.

The course has been carefully designed to be a self-paced, step by step process right from the beginning, so you won't need any previous audio knowledge. More than 10 years of pro audio instruction experience are a warranty. Check out the instructor`s Resume.

Learn professional equalization techniques right now!

There is also a Spanish version of this course.
title: Professional Audio Equalization (EQ) Techniques and Tips
